docs.text: microscopemetrics-schema A schema for microscope-metrics, a python package for microscope QC URI: https://MontpellierRessourcesImagerie.github.io/microscopemetrics-schema Name: microscopemetrics-schema Classes Class Description CentersFitted The fitted center of detected objects. Intended to be used with ROIs. CentersGeometric The geometric center of detected objects. Intended to be used with ROIs. CentersMaxIntensity The position of maximum intensity of detected objects. Intended to be used with ROIs. CentersOfMass The center of mass of detected objects. Intended to be used with ROIs. ChannelSeries A series representing channels Color A color as defined by RGB values and an optional alpha value DataReference A reference to a data resource MetaObject None MetricsInputData An abstract class for analysis input data FieldIlluminationInputData None PSFBeadsInputData None UserExperimentInputData None MetricsInputParameters An abstract class for analysis inputs parameters FieldIlluminationInputParameters None PSFBeadsInputParameters None UserExperimentInputParameters None MetricsOutput An abstract class for analysis outputs FieldIlluminationOutput None PSFBeadsOutput None UserExperimentOutput None MicroscopeCollection A collection of microscopes NamedObject An object with a name and a description Column Attributes of a column MetricsObject A base object for all microscope-metrics objects. Channel A image channel Comment A comment Experimenter The person that performed the experiment or developed the protocol Image A microscope-metrics image ImageMask A mask image. Either a binary image or a label image OrthogonalImage An image that is orthogonal to the main image KeyValues A collection of key-value pairs KeyMeasurements A table of key measurements FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements None PSFBeadsKeyMeasurements None UserExperimentKeyMeasurements None MetricsDataset A base object on which microscope-metrics runs the analysis FieldIlluminationDataset A field illumination dataset PSFBeadsDataset A PSF beads dataset UserExperimentDataset A dataset of non-standardized microscope samples produced during regular operation of a research project. MetricsDatasetCollection A collection of microscope-metrics datasets HarmonizedMetricsDatasetCollection A collection of harmonized microscope-metrics datasets. All of the datasets in the collection share the same analysis and processing parameters. Microscope A microscope Roi A ROI (Region Of Interest). Collection of shapes and an image to which they are applied Table A microscope-metrics table Tag A tag Protocol Set of instructions for preparing and imaging a sample Sample A sample is a standard physical object that is imaged by a microscope HomogeneousField An homogeneous field. FluorescentHomogeneousThickField An homogeneous field with a fluorescent thick sample. Similar to the Chroma slides. FluorescentHomogeneousThinField An homogeneous field with a fluorescent thin sample. Similar to a dye thin layer. PSFBeads A sample of sub-resolution sized beads used to measure the PSF of a microscope. UserExperiment A non-standardized microscope sample produced during regular operation of a research project. Shape A shape Ellipse An ellipse as defined by x, y coordinates and x and y radii Line A line as defined by x1, y1, x2, y2 coordinates Mask A mask as defined by a boolean image Point A point as defined by x and y coordinates Polygon A polygon as defined by a series of vertexes and a boolean to indicate if closed or not Rectangle A rectangle as defined by x, y coordinates and width, height ProfilesIntensity Profiles computed on the image. Intended to be used with ROIs. RoiMeasurements Measurements computed on the ROIs of an image. Intended to be used with ROIs. TimeSeries A series whose values represent time Vertex A vertex as defined by x and y coordinates Slots Slot Description acquisition_datetime The datetime of the acquisition alpha The alpha value of the color (optional) analyzed_bead_centers The centers of the beads that have been analyzed array_data A non-required slot for non-serializable array data object author The author of the comment omero_object_type The type of the OMERO object omero_port The port of the OMERO server orcid The ORCID of the experimenter orthogonal_images Orthogonal images created from the provided orthogonal_rois orthogonal_rois Rois containing a point shape where the orthogonal views are to be taken output The output of the analysis points A list of points included in the ROI polygons A list of polygons included in the ROI processed Has the dataset been processed by microscope-metrics processing_application The application used to process the dataset processing_datetime The datetime of the processing by microscope-metrics processing_entity The entity that processed the dataset processing_log The log of the processing by microscope-metrics processing_version The version of the application used to roi_centers_fitted Point ROIs marking the fitted center of the area of maximum illumination roi_centers_geometric Point ROIs marking the geometric center of the area of maximum illumination of the image in the x dimension shape_y The shape of the image in the y dimension shape_z The shape of the image in the z dimension sigma Input parameter: the sigma for the smoothing gaussian filter If images are originary in OMERO this is the image_id. from_schema: https://MontpellierRessourcesImagerie.github.io/microscopemetrics-schema rank: 1000 alias: image_id owner: FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements domain_of: - FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements range: string multivalued: true channel_name: name: channel_name description: The channel name to which the measurements apply from_schema: https://MontpellierRessourcesImagerie.github.io/microscopemetrics-schema rank: 1000 alias: channel_name owner: FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements domain_of: - FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements - PSFBeadsKeyMeasurements - UserExperimentKeyMeasurements range: string multivalued: true channel_nr: name: channel_nr description: The channel number to which the measurements apply from_schema: https://MontpellierRessourcesImagerie.github.io/microscopemetrics-schema rank: 1000 alias: channel_nr owner: FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements domain_of: - FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements - PSFBeadsKeyMeasurements - UserExperimentKeyMeasurements range: integer multivalued: true minimum_value: 0 channel_id: name: channel_id description: The channel id to which the measurements apply from_schema: https://MontpellierRessourcesImagerie.github.io/microscopemetrics-schema rank: 1000 alias: channel_id owner: FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements domain_of: - FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements range: string multivalued: true center_region_intensity_fraction: name: center_region_intensity_fraction description: The fraction of the upper intensity range occupied by the center of illumination region. That is, a value of 0.1 means that the center of illumination occupies the top 10% of the intensity range. microscope-metrics tries to adapt the threshold of this intensity so that the area occupied is not too large. One value per channel. from_schema: https://MontpellierRessourcesImagerie.github.io/microscopemetrics-schema rank: 1000 alias: center_region_intensity_fraction owner: FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements domain_of: - FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements range: float multivalued: true minimum_value: 0.0 maximum_value: 1.0 center_region_area_fraction: name: center_region_area_fraction description: The fraction of the area occupied by the center of illumination region. If the centre upper intensity fraction is 0.1, that means that the center of illumination occupies 10% of the area of the image. One value per channel. from_schema: https://MontpellierRessourcesImagerie.github.io/microscopemetrics-schema rank: 1000 alias: center_region_area_fraction owner: FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements domain_of: - FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements range: float multivalued: true minimum_value: 0.0 maximum_value: 1.0 center_of_mass_y: name: center_of_mass_y description: The y coordinate of the center of mass of the center of illumination region. In pixels. One value per channel. from_schema: https://MontpellierRessourcesImagerie.github.io/microscopemetrics-schema rank: 1000 alias: center_of_mass_y owner: FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements domain_of: - FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements range: float multivalued: true center_of_mass_y_relative: name: center_of_mass_y_relative description: The relative y position of the center of mass of the center of illumination region. Relative to the image size along that axis. -1.0 is upper edge, 0.0 is center and 1.0 is lower edge. One value per channel. from_schema: https://MontpellierRessourcesImagerie.github.io/microscopemetrics-schema rank: 1000 alias: center_of_mass_y_relative owner: FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements domain_of: - FieldIlluminationKeyMeasurements range: float multivalued: true minimum_value: -1.0 maximum_value: 1.0 center_of_mass_x: name: center_of_mass_x description: The x coordinate of the center of mass of the center of illumination region. fraction of the upper intensity range occupied by the center of illumination region. That is, a value of 0.1 means that the center of illumination occupies the top 10% of the intensity range. microscope-metrics tries to adapt the threshold of this intensity so that the area occupied is not too large. One value per channel. from_schema: https://MontpellierRessourcesImagerie.github.io/microscopemetrics-schema rank: 1000 multivalued: true alias: center_region_intensity_fraction owner: FieldIlluminationKeyValues domain_of: - FieldIlluminationKeyValues range: float minimum_value: 0.0 maximum_value: 1.0 center_region_area_fraction: name: center_region_area_fraction description: The fraction of the area occupied by the center of illumination region. That is, a value of 0.1 means that the center of illumination occupies the top 10% of the intensity range. microscope-metrics tries to adapt the threshold of this intensity so that the area occupied is not too large. One value per channel. from_schema: https://MontpellierRessourcesImagerie.github.io/microscopemetrics-schema rank: 1000 multivalued: true alias: center_region_intensity_fraction owner: FieldIlluminationKeyValues domain_of: - FieldIlluminationKeyValues range: float minimum_value: 0.0 maximum_value: 1.0 center_region_area_fraction: name: center_region_area_fraction description: The fraction of the area occupied by the center of illumination region. If the centre upper intensity fraction is 0.1, that means that the center of illumination occupies 10% of the area of the image. One value per channel. from_schema: https://MontpellierRessourcesImagerie.github.io/microscopemetrics-schema rank: 1000 multivalued: true alias: center_region_area_fraction owner: FieldIlluminationKeyValues domain_of: - FieldIlluminationKeyValues range: float minimum_value: 0.0 maximum_value: 1.0 center_of_mass_y: name: center_of_mass_y description: The y coordinate of the center of mass of the center of illumination region. docs.text: Slot: average_bead The average bead image created from all the beads considered valid. The average bead is calculated after aligning the beads in all three axes. docs.text: Slot: center_region_area_fraction The fraction of the area occupied by the center of illumination region. docs.text: Slot: center_region_intensity_fraction The fraction of the upper intensity range occupied by the center of illumination region. That is, a value of 0.1 means that the center of illumination occupies the top 10% of the intensity range. microscope-metrics tries to adapt the threshold of this intensity so that the area occupied is not too large. One value per channel.
